Supporters’ coach going to match. The men singing. Boys wearing team scarves. Pub. Mounted police. People walking to stadium. Coaches. Chants on soundtrack. Ticket touts. Crowds. Police. Going through turnstiles. Programme sellers. Mascots. The game starts. Crowds with balloons. Cheering, chanting, watching the game, clapping, shouting, etc. Singing and chanting over. Dusk. Houses next to stadium. The city at night. Credits.
